entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or a few rain showers ending this morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
